result.ga: Las an solas le do thoil
result.orig: Las an solas le do thoil
result.html: Las an solas le do thoilTurn the light on, please.
result.ponchtml: Las an solas le do ṫoilTurn the light on, please.

result.ga: Las an tine le do thoil
result.orig: Las an tine le do thoil
result.html: Las an tine le do thoilLight the fire, please.
result.ponchtml: Las an tine le do ṫoilLight the fire, please.

result.ga: Tá dath uaine éadrom ar an gceann sin
result.orig: Tá dath uaine éadrom ar an gceann sin
result.html: Tá dath uaine éadrom ar an gceann sinThat one is light green.
result.ponchtml: Tá daṫ uaine éadrom ar an gceann sinThat one is light green.

result.html: Tá an seaicéad sin ró-éadromThat jacket is too light.
result.ponchtml: Tá an seaicéad sin ró-éadromThat jacket is too light.

result.html: Las an tineLight the fire.
result.ponchtml: Las an tineLight the fire.

result.html: Tá an solas sin bristeThat light is broken.
result.ponchtml: Tá an solas sin bristeThat light is broken.

result.eng: A light coolness lingered in the air which tingled her skin and sharpened her creativity.
result.ga: D'fhan fionnuaire éadrom san aer a chuir dinglis ar a craiceann agus faobhar ar a cruthaíocht
result.orig: D'fhan fionnuaire éadrom san aer a chuir dinglis ar a craiceann agus faobhar ar a cruthaíocht
result.html: D'fhan fionnuaire éadrom san aer a chuir dinglis ar a craiceann agus faobhar ar a cruthaíochtA light coolness lingered in the air which tingled her skin and sharpened her creativity.
result.ponchtml: D'ḟan fionnuaire éadrom san aer a ċuir dinglis ar a craiceann agus faoḃar ar a cruṫaíoċtA light coolness lingered in the air which tingled her skin and sharpened her creativity.
